courseleaf.title: Approved Foreign Language Courses
courseleaf.text:
Approved Foreign Language Courses

To find a language, look in the Title column first; many subject codes do not match the language (e.g., American Sign Language is taught in the Linguistics Department, so the course code is LINGUIS).
